sentences.en: Fats and oils can be used in moderation.
From this moderation, likewise, he learns two other lessons which complete his character.
sentences.cn: 他从这种中庸之道中,还得到另外两个教训, 使他的品格更臻于完善.
他做任何事情都很有节制.

sentences.en: His life motto is: " integrity, trustworthiness, goodnaturedness, modesty & moderation ".
sentences.cn: “ 诚、信 、 慈 、 俭 、 中 ” 是他为人处世之准则.

sentences.en: His message about moderation and the middle class captured the attention of the press, which anointed him front-runner.
sentences.cn: 他关于中庸和中产阶级的观点引起媒体的注意，使他成为获胜的热门人选。

sentences.en: Many adults are able to drink in moderation, but others become dependent on alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多成年人饮酒都能够适度，但是另一些人却嗜酒成性。

sentences.en: Moderation in all things is my motto.
sentences.cn: 凡事有节制是我的座右铭.

sentences.en: Moderation is the key to good health.
sentences.cn: 有节制的生活是健康的关键.

sentences.en: Moderation, after all, is a virtue only in those who are thought to have an alternative.
sentences.cn: 适度是一种美德, 但适度毕竟只存在于那些被认为有选择余地的人当中.

sentences.en: nuts can be eaten in moderation.
Some people think drinking in moderation can prevent heart disease.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为适量饮酒可以预防心脏病。

sentences.en: The doctor advised more moderation in eating and drinking.
sentences.cn: 医生建议在饮食方面应更加节制.

sentences.en: The new drug achieved some moderation of the pain.
sentences.cn: 新药使疼痛减轻了一点.

sentences.en: There was a call for moderation on the part of the trade unions.
sentences.cn: 有人呼吁工会保持克制。

sentences.en: They showed a remarkable degree of moderation in not quarrelling publicly on television.
sentences.cn: 他们表现得极为克制,未在电视上公开吵起来.

sentences.en: We should learn to say things in season and do things in moderation.
sentences.cn: 我们应当学会说话合时宜,做事多考虑.

sentences.en: Will alcoholic drinks be harmful if taken in moderation?
sentences.cn: 适量饮酒是否有害健康?
